Package ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.fragments

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomLocationFragment
    This class is a fragment which allows the user to specify a custom location for their post.
    EditFragment
    Allows the user to edit the text, location, and image of a comment they have made.
    ExpandImageFragment
    Fragment responsible for displaying an image full screen Image is expanded upon clicking the comment thumbnail
    FavouriteCommentsFragment
    Fragment for displaying the child comments of a saved thread.
    FavouritesFragment
    Displays user's favourited threads/comments, provides navigation to each via a spinner.
    FavouriteThreadsFragment
    Display the user's favourited threadComments in a list using ThreadListAdapter.
    MapViewFragment
    A Fragment class for displaying Maps.
    PostFragment
    Responsible for the UI fragment that allows a user to post a new thread.
    ThreadListFragment
    Responsible for the UI fragment that displays multiple ThreadComments to the user.
    ThreadViewFragment
    Fragment which displays the contents of a ThreadComment and performs all actions on the objects in that ThreadComment.
    UpdateDialogFragment
    Creates a simple dialog that is displayed when internet connection has been regained after a period of no connectivity, which prompts the user whether they would like to refresh the current ThreadComment or list of ThreadComments.
